description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides funding to the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) for the UNDP's "Support to Elections in Egypt" project. The project aims to support national efforts to strengthen the efficiency and transparency of the electoral process with a view to enhance credibility and acceptance of the election results. The project will continue after the election focussing on capacity building of national electoral stakeholders along with public information and voter education activities. The project has four major components: 1) Strengthening of public outreach to voter information about parliamentary elections; 2) Upgrading the technical and operational capacity of national electoral authorities to conduct credible elections in 2011, and to improve the electoral processes in the medium to long term; 3) Lessons learnt from the 2011 election process to benefit subsequent elections; and 4) increase access of women and rural dwellers to their citizenship rights in t
